code: import axios from'axios';var getInfo=function getInfo(){return axios.get("/info");};var getTransactions=function getTransactions(page){return axios.get("/transactions/last_transactions/".concat(page));};var getBlock=function getBlock(block){return axios.get("/blocks/block?hash=".concat(block));};var getTransaction=function getTransaction(hash){return axios.get("/transactions/transaction?hash=".concat(hash));};var getAddress=function getAddress(address,page){return axios.get("/address/".concat(address,"/").concat(page));};export default{getInfo:getInfo,getTransactions:getTransactions,getBlock:getBlock,getTransaction:getTransaction,getAddress:getAddress};
